DOC.brief_summary: The present study investigate effect aerobic exercise cognition growth factor include brain-derived neurotrophic factor ( BDNF ) young adult age 15-21 year . The included subject randomize three different group include one control group two exercise group . Subjects randomize exercise group complete 30 minute aerobic exercise 3 time week 9 week incorporate low ( group I ) high ( group II ) intensity aerobic exercise . The exercise conduct run indoor cycling ( supervise ) . At baseline 9-weeks follow-up subject complete two cognitive test ( measure concentration sustain attention ) , maximal cycling test ( direct measure VO2max ) , intelligence quotient test , anthropometric measure , fast blood sample blood sample immediately follow cycle test . The blood sample analyze growth factor include BDNF metabolic factor .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Aerobic Exercise Cognitive Function Brain-derived Neurotrophic Factor Young Adults
DOC.criteria: age 1521 injury prevent one physically active
